name: Antique Pianos
description:
11 beautiful sounding, rare pianos.
Professionally sampled, 25 Keys per instrument (single velocity).

Pianos:
Angelic, Darkness, Celesta, Crystal, Dulcitone, Gold-Star, Grand, Cinematic, Suitcase, Dusty, Glockenspiel.
